name: EPL Dashboard
description: Using GCP and Power BI to Visualize English Premier League Data from 2009-2024

name: AI-text-Summarizer-App
description: This web application uses the power of Hugging Face's Facebook/bart-large-cnn model to condense lengthy texts into concise summaries.

name: Olympics 2024 Azure Data Engineering Pipeline
description: Data engineering pipeline on Azure that ingests data via Azure Data Factory from a data source, stores it, transforms it on via Azure Data-bricks, stores the transformed data and performs data warehousing via Azure Synapse Analytics.

name: Student performance predictor
description: Machine Learning project seeks to predict the math scores of students by assessing various dependent factors through automated ML Training and Deployment to Azure & GitHub Actions

name: Azure Automobile Price Prediction
description: Deploying a linear regression model to predict the prices of automobiles through the Azure Platform
